title: Ticket #359: Add test history to cross test results
description: When you click on the cross tests results page and see all of them for a platform, the test names should be links to a history of the test in the cross test context. This would match the test history feature for the native platforms.
remarks: Decided to allow overall view of cross tests with native so the entire grid is seen in the same context. Cross tests are labeled.
